summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating the licensing of vehicles for hire of whatsoever kind and by whatsoever power propelled; providing penalties for violation thereof; and repealing Section 30, 31, 32, 33, 34 and 35, of Ordinance No. 15855 of the City of Seattle, entitled: "An ordinance to license and regulate certain trades and occupations in the City of Seattle, and providing penalties for violation thereof" approved April 25, 1907; and repealing Ordinance No. 17003 of the City of Seattle entitled: "An ordinance licensing and regulating the charge of persons engaged in the business of removal and transportation of household goods and vehicles in the City of Seattle and providing penalties for violation thereof" effective pursuant to section 16, Article VI, of the City Charter, September 24, 1907.
